content:
# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Iron Plate Production at position(x=41.0, y=-82.0)
Consists of a furnace at position(x=41.0, y=-82.0) and a burner mining drill at position(x=43.0, y=-82.0) with a burner inserter at position(x=43.5, y=-80.5) that connects the drill to a chest at position(x=43.5, y=-79.5) and another chest at position(x=44.5, y=-81.5).

### Coal Storage at position(x=43.5, y=-79.5)
Consists of a wooden chest at position(x=43.5, y=-79.5) that stores coal.

### Iron Ore Mining at position(x=-15.5, y=-50.5)
Consists of an iron ore mining location at position(x=-15.5, y=-50.5).

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when inserting items into full inventories
- Ensure that the inventory of the entity is not full before attempting to insert items.
### Errors when trying to insert items that are not available in the inventory
- Check the inventory for the required items before attempting to insert them into an entity.
### Errors when output is blocked by items on the ground
- Ensure that there is a sink entity in place to accept the output of the burner mining drill.
### Errors when inserter is waiting for source items
- Ensure that the inserter has a source of items to pick up before attempting to use it.
